abstract: Jessica Kerwin Jenkins reviews book The History and Uncertain Future of Handwriting by Anne Trubek.

headline.main: The Story of How Handwriting Evolved, and May Soon Die Off

keywords.value: The History and Uncertain Future of Handwriting (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

snippet: “The History and Uncertain Future of Handwriting,” by Anne Trubek, urges a long goodbye and an embrace of a neurological metamorphosis....
lead_paragraph: “The History and Uncertain Future of Handwriting,” by Anne Trubek, urges a long goodbye and an embrace of a neurological metamorphosis.
